ComicInfo.Summary:
Rai questions his leadership ability, but soon realizes that he must battle the Emperor and save all of humanity.
1st appearance:
- Mother Nike
Tokoa Konishi seeks council with Mother Nike, to debate on joining Magnus to North Am to fight Malev Emperor or stay and fight in Japan.
